ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] necro resources
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, you will need to kill about 100 gnolls, but you can go into Qeynos and shop and stuff, my brother did it at level 5, to 7 and then could go into
ygData.messageBody:
> Also, as an erudite necro, I'm wondering where to
> hunt after I reach level
> 8; can I, for example, kill enough gnolls to make it
> possible to shop in
> Qeynos? are there vendors that'll sell to me in the
> sewers? thanks!
>

Yes, you will need to kill about 100 gnolls, but you
can go into Qeynos and shop and stuff, my brother did
it at level 5, to 7 and then could go into qeynos with
no worries.
